title: Verify Full Refund Processing
objective: To verify that customer service representatives can successfully process full refunds
preconditions: CS rep is logged into admin portal
Order is within refund window (30 days)

test_steps.action: Login to admin portal as Customer Service Rep
Search for order using order number
test_steps.expected_result: Order is found and displays in search results

test_steps.action: Click on order to view details
test_steps.expected_result: Order details page opens showing full order information

test_steps.action: Verify order is eligible for refund (status, date, payment method)
test_steps.expected_result: Order meets refund criteria, 'Process Refund' button is enabled

test_steps.action: Select 'Full Refund' option and enter reason: 'Customer request - product not as expected'
test_steps.expected_result: Refund amount auto-populated with order total, reason field accepts text

test_steps.action: Review refund summary: Amount, Method (original payment method), Processing time
test_steps.expected_result: Refund summary displays correctly with all details
Refund is processed, success message displayed

test_steps.action: Verify refund transaction is logged in order timeline
test_steps.expected_result: Timeline shows refund entry with date, time, amount, and CS rep name

test_steps.action: Check customer's email for refund notification
test_steps.expected_result: Customer receives email confirming refund with amount and ETA

notes: Also test partial refunds, refunds for different payment methods (PayPal, Credit Card). Verify refund policy enforcement.
